channel.title: Npc following help

item.title: Npc following help
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

I spent a good hour using the failure most people call a “search bar”, and came across some codes to put this together:

                                       [code]if (droppedItem == 7583) { //hell cat
                            int index = 3505;
			server.npcHandler.newNPC(3505, absX, absY, heightLevel, absX, absY, absX, absY, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(3505), false);
                            server.npcHandler.npcs[index].followPlayer = playerId;
            		server.npcHandler.npcs[index].followingPlayer = true;
			}[/code]

The npc doesnt spawn =/ Besides that, is the following part correct?

Read full topic
